amendment.description: Amendment allows grantees to count in-kind contributions toward a matching requirement.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 25 printed in House Report 107-69 amends Title V to make it easier for entities in disadvantaged communities to successfully apply for 21st century community learning grants in states that exercise the option to require a match by allowing them to meet the matching requirement with in-kind contributions.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Velazquez amendment (A024) Agreed to by voice vote.
